Key Match Events: Cape Verde defeated Mauritania 1-0 in the Africa Cup of Nations Round of 16 on January 29, 2024.
Mendes scored the winning penalty for Cape Verde in the 88th minute.
Niasse received a yellow card in the 87th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde aimed to match their best Africa Cup of Nations showing by reaching the quarter-finals.
Cape Verde topped Group B, which included Egypt and Ghana.
Mauritania reached the knockout stage for the first time in their history after defeating Algeria.
